description: Must-watch videos about Django (or about Python as applied to Django)

name: One Month Django
description: The video series will teach you Django in one month

name: Django-manage.py-anywhere
description: Run manage.py commands from anywhere. Finds closest to current path manage.py file and runs commands against it.

name: Logan
description: A toolkit for running standalone Django applications. It provides you with tools to create a CLI runner, manage settings, and the ability to bootstrap the process.
